Who is an "Artist?"

Anyone who has or is planned to release music on Dekabass is an artist. Artists are in one of 3 categories: core members, satellite members, and past members. You can read more on types of artists here. All artists are listed alphabetically.

Core Members

Bleeve
yo what's poppin
Bleeve is an up and coming heavy drum and bass producer. Using killer basses and punchy drums, he takes dnb to a new level.
Echozki
Nothing will work unless you do.
I am Echozki. I like to play games and make music that has emotion and story attached.

My musical journey was put into motion in the year 13.8 billion (BC) when a universe emerged with adequate conditions for me to exist. The rest is history.

Artist Categories

Artists listed here are in one of three categories:

Core Members

These guys are hardcore. They are the ones who first settled the lands that became the kingdom of Dekabass. They regularly release music and won't be leaving any time soon. Some may say they "run" Dekabass.

Satellite Members

These people are far out. They are the highest class civilian denizens of the kingdom. We cannot guarantee that they'll release as regularly as core members (although many of them do). They aren't permanent members of Dekabass, but we hope to see them stick around. Contact us if you want to be a satellite member!

Past Members

There are some who no longer release music or haven't yet released music with us (despite wanting to and being allowed into the kingdom). It's unlikely that our kingdom will once again be graced by the sonic experiences of these individuals, but that doesn't mean we can't list them here.
